A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too many plots 
Bad plots
Rey is a bad character (still)
Daisy Ridley is a bad actress
Too much inconsistency and nonsense (being alive in space\, opening doors straight to space\, characters going against what they say (("theres no light left in Kylo"))[or whatever]\, Luke holding dumb dice and touching Leia despite being a hologram and his clothes moving in the wind)
The obvious political agenda being /forced/
And worst of all\, Luke's final fight is short\, essentially worthless because he was just a hologram doing things with his mind\, and is basically stalling. He died to save time for the 'resistance'.
